task_text: Find me the least busy person with interest in Interest in cross-site collaboration

text_blocks: Let me try searching with a different will name format:
Found employees with the will. Let me continue paginating to get all employees with this interest:

Now I have all 154 employees with the "will_cross_site" interest. Next, I need to calculate workloads for all of them to find the least busy person. Let me collect all employee IDs and calculate workloads:

I have 78 employees with 0.0 FTE workload (the minimum). I need to use tiebreakers. According to the rules, I should pick the one with the highest employee ID. Looking at the employees_at_min list, the highest ID is "CjTb_154". Let me get their full profile to confirm:

Angela Leone has the will_cross_site interest (level 4) and has 0.0 FTE workload, making her the least busy person with interest in cross-site collaboration. Since there are multiple employees with 0.0 workload, the tiebreaker rule says to pick the highest employee ID, which is CjTb_154 (Angela Leone).

input.message:
